mapper.select: select COUNT(DISTINCT(zh)) FROM jjg_fbgc_lmgc_lqlmysd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd}
SELECT DISTINCT(sffl) FROM jjg_fbgc_lmgc_lqlmysd WHERE proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and fbgc= #{fbgc}
